submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, arr: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(arr)
        pre = arr[0]
        window = 1
        ans = 0
        i = 1
        co = 1
        while(co < n+k-1):
            i = i%n
            if arr[i] != pre:
                window += 1
                pre = arr[i]
            else:
                window = 1
                pre = arr[i]

            if window == k:
                ans += 1
                window -= 1
            i+=1
            co += 1
        
        return ans
